name: Screams from the Past
description:
In this gripping suspense game, your mission is to uncover the dark past of the orphanage and uncover the truth behind the mystery surrounding the location. Prepare yourself for a tense environment filled with clues, where each found object and each apparition will bring you closer to the final revelation.

Unraveling the mystery becomes your main mission. Collect evidence, solve puzzles, and follow the traces left by the creature to uncover the truth behind the disturbing events plaguing the abandoned orphanage.

As you delve deeper into the investigation, three suspects emerge as the main candidates. Use your discernment and deduction skills to reveal the true culprit.

CONTAINS

    * Explore an abandoned orphanage.
    * Gather clues and discover the culprit.
    * Investigation and scares filled with disturbing revelations.
    * An inventory to store some items.
